snippet: Outfielder Brett Gardner and the Yankees agreed to a one-year, $2.85 million contract.
abstract: New York Yankees and outfielder Brett Gardner agree to a one-year, $2.85 million contract; other MLB developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Outfielder Brett Gardner and the Yankees agreed to a one-year, $2.85 million contract.

headline.main: Gardner and Yankees Reach a Deal
headline.print_headline: Gardner and Yankees Reach a Deal
